评论概述: Probably the best skirt I own
评论详情: I love this skirt. The material is nice and doesn't feel or look cheap. And, since I'm short (5'0), I rolled up the waist a few times and it doesn't look scrunched or wonky at all. And the pockets are lower so when I rolled it up they were still useable which was awesome, I usually have problems with that. And the color was exactly what I wanted. I haven't worn it out yet but I have a feeling it will become a comfort wear. Will def get more colors. The only wish I have is that it wasn't so long for the shorter girlies! But that's nothing a tall boot can't fix.
it was very long on me and i am 5'2. If you are taller than me it should work well! Id say 5'6 and taller.

Ordered this and received the wrong size and then returned it and ordered again and got the right size but a completely different skirt and it was brown instead of white. Not good quality or lining underneath.
Very flattering, I love the flexible waist band which allows for a perfect fit. Comfy and cute but also good material, absolutely worth the money!
Skirt fits perfect and love the pockets!

(as shown in the photo) I will update and iron it later to see if it looks better -Material is too heavy, maybe good if you’re wearing it in winter but it almost feels like a curtain texture.

nice color and very comfortable full length skirt.  bought 2

I got a large and it's the tiniest bit big but doesn't matter for this kind of skirt. I'm 5'8" and it's the perfect length.
Love the cut of this skirt! The perfect flowy skirt and it has pockets which is always a plus. The layers are thick and not very breathable so it can keep you pretty warm.

A little longer skirt than expected.  But it's got pockets! Very nice skirt.
It has pockets, it's not see through.  It's super high quality and very comfortable.

i really love this skirt! I think it is really well made. Havent washed it yet, but it doesnt feel like the type of material to just fall apart on you. One thing I will say that applies to all my fellow short girls - I am 5’1 and this comes down to the floor on me! Although, I can roll up the waist and it doesnt bulk up weirdly. I dont mind the length at all but it for sure doesnt match what you may think based on the picture with the model (which is so typical when your short, lol)
the skirt and fabric were just what I was looking for but the skirt I received was stained. It looked like someone had spot treated it and never washed it -weird.
I am so happy with this purchase grade value for the money great product really good quality
The skirt is lovely. Washes and dries great. Has pockets! Super comfy. Looks good
Solid staple! Not see through, breezy, doesn't look cheap, and better quality than expected! Definitely recommend
Cute skirt. Was a little long until it got washed. I did put in dryer which shrunk it a little, but did make it super wrinkly.

It fit perfectly and it’s so comfortable! Great quality and the fact that it has pockets is a plus! It’s pretty much true to size I’m 5’1 124lbs and the small fit perfectly. I was worried it would be too long but no didn’t drag on the floor it was perfect.
True to size. Perfect if you’re looking for a long white maxi skirt.
It fits well, the material has good weight, and the skirt flows when I walk.

This maxi skirt is incredibly cute and comfortable! The design is stylish, and it drapes beautifully, making it a great choice for both casual and dressy occasions. The fabric is soft and the skirt feels great against the skin.  However, I found that the inner lining, while adding to the overall structure, does limit the skirt's breathability. During a recent trip to Rome with temperatures reaching 95 degrees, I struggled to cool off. The skirt’s lack of ventilation made it a bit challenging to stay comfortable in such hot weather.

Im a medium and I recommend sizing down, i got a medium and its length is from mid stomach to my ankles, great if your wearing heels with it, im 5’2 1/2, weight: 143, love the pockets. The color is beautiful! If i got a size small it would definitely by from my hips down to the ankle. It’s nice and flowy but not too flowy and not too stiff, which i like. Great if your planning to dance in it (twirling, spinning and swaying) i do want to also point out that it doesnt bring the short pants underneath the skirt like how some do, over all glad with my purchase!

Love the skirt it does have an underlay underneath it. I have not got to wear it in public yet so I do not know if you can still see through it or not, but the quality of the skirt is great. It is very comfortable when I tried it on, the appearance is fantastic. The value of the money I think could come down because there are other companies out there like Temu who are cheaper but you could dress this skirt up anyway you want. Great find I am 54 124 pounds and ordered a small but I believe anybody in 130 pounds or 135 could wear a small as well because of the elastic waistband

This skirt is nice cotton. I am 5’ 3”, a lot of skirts are too long for me. This one is perfect in length. Hits at my ankles, so it doesn’t drag on the ground. I can dress it up or be casual. I wear it all the time.

I have been looking for just the right skirt for my country girl and I found it.

This skirt has a half liner and several tiers of thicker outer fabric. The ruffled style means it doesn’t matter if it’s wrinkled, which makes it nice for travel. I suppose it could be a little higher quality for the price but it’s acceptable and works.

I absolutely love this skirt! Cannot say enough good things about it. The material is thick but it’s not too heavy and breathable. It’s a well made and durable. The a-line cut is so flattering on my mom bod and hides the tummy well. It’s flowy and comfortable. I meant to size up 1 to a large and accidentally bought an XL and I’m glad I did. The waist is stretchy enough but not tight. It did shrink slightly in the dryer but not too much. Just make sure you take it out immediately and lay flat to avoid wrinkles. Did not have any wrinkles after a full day of wearing. I also bought the lake color along with the black and both are gorgeous. The black is slightly more forgiving though. I just wish there was a light tan or mauve/dusty rose type color. Will be buying more for sure. Oh and the pockets are nice and deep.
After two wears, the waist band is falling apart and the middle of the skirt looks like swiss cheese. It was cute but falls apart too quickly to be worth your money!

Love the color length, and fit... But then I washed on cold and dried on low. It shrank and is now too small.  I also have the black one, same size and material feels the same, and I loved it which is why I bought the red one. The black one was washed the same way and did not shrink.
I do love the pockets. I'm 5'4" and the skirt is a little long on me, but I really like it. Haven't washed it yet. Hopefully all will go well.

I’m 5 ft, 140 lbs. I got a medium white. I own a lot of skirts and this is the one I reach for the most. It’s longer on me, which I prefer. Hits right at my ankles. I dress it up with platforms or down with sneakers. I’ll be buying more colors and wearing them into the autumn and winter with boots.

i feel like alot of these skirts have been misleading or some times transparent because its white but its super cute, good quality, and has a double lining that helps for whatever bottoms you decide to wear

Not bad. Okay only

I rarely write reviews, but slightly obsessed with this skirt. I’m short, barely 5’3”, so it’s hard to find a maxi that doesn’t drape the floor. Typically size 8-10 and size medium fit perfect. Quality linen like material that’s not too heavy or thin. Buying in more colors!
Great style and  flattering. Easy to wash.
Love the skirt, especially for the price. The waist runs a bit small. I’m a 4 and the S is snug. May send back for a M.
Good quality for the price, compared to other sites this skirt is very worth it and very cute. A little see thru but just wear nude underwear and you're good to go.

I bought this to wear for my birthday five months ago and have worn it very often just going out with friends/family or for work (I am a math teacher). I have gotten a lot of compliments on my outfits when I have worn this skirt and it is SUPER comfortable. I have this skirt in orange and green. The pockets are very convenient as I can fit my phone in one side and my wallet and keys in the other. I am 5'7" and was around 135lbs when I ordered a medium but have lost a little bit of weight (like 7ish lbs) and I still wear it. It is a little loose but the elastic holds the skirt up well. Sometimes I have to adjust the skirt if I have stuff in my pockets weighing it down. Fabric wrinkles somewhat easily.

I thought I would love this skirt, I bought it in a large and it was fine in the waist but huge in the ruffle area. It flows well, is excellent quality fabric, the pattern is lovely and is very comfortable, but I couldn't wear it out and about.

评论概述: Fabric and length not as expected

Way too much fabric used makes this unnecessarily heavy. Overall fit was way too big.
its listed as a small but size was too large
If you’re wide in the hips-this is not for you.  The first tier hits too low and added 20 pounds to my butt.  Also, the material was in the scratchy side.

I bought two of these skirts for a dress up activity for two adult women. The advert says "one size" and so there are no options for sizing. When the skirts came, the size is X-Large. I understand "one size" can be a bit of a gamble, but usually it means that the stretch is such that it can expand or that there are ways to make it larger or smaller. What you do get is an X-Large skirt. On my friend, it just fell off her. On me (I am about 125 pounds), the waist came to the widest part of the hips. They are not sheer and for the right size, I think would be cute. So just be aware you are ordering an X-Large sized skirt.

I ordered this product for my trip to Spain! The material is a linen material and it is SUPER COMFY! It was very comfortable and very breathable, I was in Spain for the hot summer months. Plus it has pockets!! It is my new favorite skirt and love it so much! 100% would recommend it to anyone who is seeking a cute, comfortable, and convenient skirt!
Love it . Its hard to find long skirts made of cotton and with pockets

This product barely lasted 4 months. I know you get what you pay for, but that is crazy. The stitching on on the tiered portion was coming undone and because the material was so low quality the fabric was just fraying apart making it a challenge to even sew back up.  The material is also very rough and scratchy.  I would not recommend this product.

评论概述: A nice skirt made from nice linen like fabric, but....
评论详情: The color and the fabric are lovely, but the small size I ordered was made for a small hippopotamus. I made a back seam and took it in TEN inches! Plus it the length of the first tier was so long, that I pulled it up about three inches, and still had to hem the bottom in order to get it to fit. Why didn't I send it back? Because the turquoise color is so beautiful and the fabric is very nice.
This skirt has plenty of stretch, very comfortable and falls nice. It is somewhat shear so be aware, I pair it with a longer shirt.

Bought this skirt in 3 colors after I saw my daughter’s black skirt on her.  Love it!  Perfect for summer and such a great length that I might wear it throughout the year. It’s not too sheer and has a built in short slip for modesty.

This was exactly what I was looking for!! It’s pretty, good material, lightweight but not flimsy. It’s a great length too! I’m 5’2 so I was worried it would be too long but it’s not! It is slightly see through, so just wear nude undergarments! Love!
Skirt was true to size and very comfortable.

I was looking for a good white linen tiered maxi skirt, and I found it. This skirt is flattering, and I get a good amount of compliments on it. I enjoy the feeling/material of it, and the length is great. I am 5'11 and it hits my ankles in the right spot.
